content: rinse and drain carefully and without twisting the fabric put place the sleeve stitches on hold back on the needles place a stitch to dry on a flat surface shaping the sweater marker at the beginning of the round work as follow round 1 k1 k2tog yo twice ssk repeat until 1 st before end k1 hope you like and enjoy it sm mykonos sweater by romi- dame la lata march 2023 page 4 if you have any questions you can find me on @damelalata on romi-damelalata or you can email me at romi- damelalata@hotmail com yoke increased chart o - o 8 o / \ o 7 o - o 6 chart key \ o o / 5 knit \ ssk o - o 4 o / \ o 3 - purl o yo o - o 2 \ o o / 1 / k2tog pattern repeat 6 5 4 3 2 1 body chart sleeve chart - 4 - 4 \ o o / 3 o / \ o 3 - 2 - 2 o / \ o 1 \ o o / 1 6 5 4 3 2 1 6 5 4 3 2 1 mykonos sweater by romi- dame la lata march 2023 page 5
